name: Maestro
body:
Maestro is a [Fabric](http://fabfile.org) based toolkit for managing systems.  There is also integration with cloud providers (currently Amazon EC2 and Rackspace) via [Apache Libcloud](http://libcloud.apache.org).

# Installation

* `pip install maestro`

# Usage
Either download the [included](https://github.com/ehazlett/maestro/blob/master/fabfile.py) fabfile or create your own:

```python
from maestro.core import *
from maestro import system as sys
```

You can then run `fab -l` to see the available tasks.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
